repo_description: For sharing files with workshop participants at AECTech+ Barcelona 2024.
instruction: 02 draw embedded sprite bitmap right corner over lay
code:
ï»¿import System
import Rhino as rc
import Grasshopper as gh
import GhPython.Assemblies.ExecutingComponent as component

class MyComponent(component):
        
    def RunScript(self,Scale,Offset):
        self.scale,self.offset = Scale,Offset
        
    def DrawOverlay(self,sender,arg):
        
        # Check component preview/locked, active GH document
        if (not ghenv.Component.Hidden and not ghenv.Component.Locked 
            and ghenv.Component.OnPingDocument() == gh.Instances.ActiveCanvas.Document):
            
            # Convert image encoded as byte string to .NET bitmap
            string = ""
            byteArray = System.Convert.FromBase64String(string)
            bitmap1 = System.Drawing.ImageConverter().ConvertFrom(byteArray)
            
            # Make draw position point at right upper corner
            bmw = bitmap1.Width * self.scale
            bmh = bitmap1.Height * self.scale
            vpw = arg.Viewport.Size.Width
            pt = rc.Geometry.Point2d((vpw-bmw/2)-self.offset,(bmh/2)+self.offset)
            
            # Convert to RhinoCommon bitmap and draw sprite
            bitmap2 = rc.Display.DisplayBitmap(bitmap1)
            arg.Display.DrawSprite(bitmap2,pt,bmw,bmh)
            
    def __exit__(self):
        rc.Display.DisplayPipeline.DrawOverlay -= self.DrawOverlay
        
    def __enter__(self):
        rc.Display.DisplayPipeline.DrawOverlay += self.DrawOverlay
